name: S.O.S (Jesús Martínez, Kaprojo, puive13, Alejandro Pérez)
name_original: S.O.S (Jesús Martínez, Kaprojo, puive13, Alejandro Pérez)
description:
S.O.S is an arcade rhythm-dodge game where you have to send an S.O.S. signal to your ship while dodging the asteroids. Try to not get dizzy!

This game was made in 48h for the Global Game Jam Bcn:

  • GGJ Bcn 2021 Game Website.
  • GGJ Bcn 2021.
Controls:

Use W/A/S/D to move the astronaut to dodge the asteroids.

Use 'Space' to press the button.

Build download Only: ALT + ENTER for Full Screen.

Credits and metions:

All links at 'more information'

  • Music & Sounds:
    • "Chill of Cold" by Loyalty Freak Music.
    • "Grat Dark Spot" by Jahzzar.
  • Unity Assets:
    • Simple Toon.
    • Pixelation.
    • Dynamic Space Background Lite.
